Body: Description: Request the latest update of the EPP server to resolve security advisory ADV-2025-001.
What We've Learned Updated: We asked for confirmation regarding the internet connectivity for the EPP Server in order to apply the requested update.
Next Steps Updated: We are waiting for the customer's confirmation to be able to decide what will be the next step (Live Update, or postpone until Offline Path is available)

What We've Learned Updated: We asked for confirmation regarding the internet connectivity for the EPP Server in order to apply the requested update.

The EPP Server is air gaped and cannot be connected to the internet.

Next Steps Updated: We are waiting for the customer's confirmation to be able to decide what will be the next step (Live Update, or postpone until Offline Path is available)

We have postponed this ticket until next week when will check internally for the availability of the offline patch.

What We've Learned Updated: We asked for confirmation regarding the internet connectivity for the EPP Server in order to apply the requested update.

The EPP Server is air gaped and cannot be connected to the internet.

We have sent the download link and the necessary steps for applying the 5941 offline patch.

Next Steps Updated: We are waiting for the customer's confirmation to be able to decide what will be the next step (Live Update, or postpone until Offline Path is available)

We have postponed this ticket until next week when will check internally for the availability of the offline patch.

We are waiting for the customer's confirmation after applying the patch.
